name: Internal Host Recon - Database/API Protocol Scan
description: Detects scanning or connection attempts targeting common database or API protocols (e.g., Redis, MongoDB, MSSQL_TDS, MySQL, Oracle, Postgres, DRDA, Cassandra, Elasticsearch, JSON-RPC, Protobuf, WebDAV, AMQP, Memcached, Z3950). This behavior indicates reconnaissance for high-value data sources or attempts to exploit application programming interfaces.
